data.title: Legal Notice
data.meta_description: Find the legal information on the Tootbus website and RATP Dev company.
data.text:
Website information

Welcome to the www.tootbus.com website (herein after referred to as the “Site”). By using this site, you acknowledge having read this legal notice and you agree to respect it. This legal notice is intended to inform you of the existence of intellectual property rights to be respected. The content of this notice may change; we therefore invite you to consult it regularly.

Production and development

User Adgents

Publication Director: Arnaud Masson

Hosting: the Site is hosted by RATP Dev

Purpose of the Site

The Site provides information on Tootbus. This Site is the property of RATP Development SA (herein after referred to as the “Company”), a limited company with capital of 369 300 834 Euros - RCS Paris number 389 795 006.

Head office: 54, quai de la Rapée, LAC LA 30, 75012 Paris

EEC VAT number: FR 75 389 795 006

Protected rights – Intellectual property

The elements constituting this Site, developed by or on behalf of the Company (hereinafter referred to as the "Content"), are protected by the applicable legislation concerning copyright, trademark law, design law and unfair competition.

The Content includes, in particular, the architecture, the graphic charter (including the colours, the fonts and the graphic organization of the screens), as well as all the information and elements available on the Internet Site, including the texts, articles, photographs, illustrations, images, brands and logos, data, databases and all sound elements (such as voice, music or sound effects) and fixed or animated visuals (such as graphic animations or audio-visual sequences), specific software developments, downloadable programs.

The Content is the property of the Company or its technical service providers.

Any reproduction, representation, distribution and/or exploitation of all or part of the Content, by any means, in any form and for any purpose whatsoever, is prohibited without the express prior written consent of the Company. In any case, and subject to the foregoing, the source (this Site and the Company) and, if applicable, the name of the author, must be clearly indicated.

Anyone who does not comply with the applicable legal provisions is guilty of the offense of counterfeiting and is liable to the penal sanctions provided for by law, notwithstanding any other legal action taken by the Company.

Liability

The Company excludes all warranties of any kind with respect to the Content, including any warranty of fitness for a particular purpose, ownership and non-infringement. In addition, the Company disclaim any liability whatsoever for direct or indirect damages, incidental or consequential damages, loss of data or profit, resulting from or related to the use or operation of this Site and the Content.

In addition, the Site may contain inaccuracies or typographical errors. Changes and updates are regularly made to this Site. In this respect, the Company reserves the right to make any modification, rectification or change at any time.

This Site contains links allowing you to leave the Site. These links are provided for your convenience only, and do not imply endorsement or endorsement of such sites by the Company. The target sites are not under the control of the Company, and they are in no way responsible for the content of these sites, the links they contain, the products or services they offer, or the changes or updates made to them.

Trademarks, product names or services, domain names and corporate names mentioned on this Site remain the property of their respective owners.

The mention of links or trademarks, names, services, domain names and names of other companies does not imply the existence of any association between the Company and these companies, products or services, brands, names or denominations in question.

Protection of privacy – Collection and use of personal data

The use of our website requires the collection and processing of personal data about you. For more information, we invite you to read our Privacy Policy available on our website.

Applicable law and jurisdiction

The Site and its Content are governed by French Law, and any dispute relating to it will be subjected to the jurisdiction of the French courts.
